section.p: An external billing system needs to be registered in before it can be used.

p.b: To register an external billing system:

section.p: In the administration portal, choose Manage billing systems in the Operation menu. For detailed step-by-step instructions, refer to the online help.
You need to provide the following information:

ul.li: Billing system ID. This ID uniquely identifies the billing system in . It is specified in the definitions of the technical services which intend to use the billing system.
Short description of the billing system.
The JNDI name of the billing adapter as well as additional connection properties required for the JNDI lookup.

section.p: An external billing system as well as the native billing system can be removed from as long as:

ul.li: It is not the default billing system.
There are no technical services, marketable services, or subscriptions using it.
